## OWebRouteContext.getSearchParam() method

Gets search param value.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getSearchParam(name: string, def?: string): string | null;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | string | the search param name |
|  def | string | <i>(Optional)</i> the default to return when not defined |

<b>Returns:</b>

string \| null
